mapper.select: SELECT s.stud_id, s.stud_address, s.stud_area, s.stud_room_no, s.ban, c.com_name, c.com_people, c.phone, s.stud_num, s.update_time, s.create_time FROM studio s, company c WHERE s.com_id = c.com_id ORDER BY s.update_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE studio SET ban = #{ban}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE stud_id = #{studId}
